title: Dagadi Chawl (2015) Marathi - DVDScr - Full Movie With Backgroun
description:
Plot:

The movie is inspired from Mumbai's actual Dagdi Chawl which was known for gangster activities during 80s and 90s and was also the official residence of a gangster turned political leader, popularly known as 'daddy'. But, the film is not about the gangster activities. It is about how, a common man was dragged into gangster activity. The film will present a love story of the lead character.

Cast:

Ankush Choudhary as Surya

Makarand Deshpande as daddy

Pooja Sawant as Sonal

Sanjay Khapre as Mama

Kamlesh Sawant as Inspector Kale

Yatin Karyekar as Daddy's Assistant aka Kala Coat

Crew & Production:

Directed by: Chandrakant Kanse

Produced by: Amol D. Kale, Suresh B. Sawant

Written by: Ajay Tamhane, Pravin Kamle, Adesh K. Arjun

Starring: Ankush Choudhary, Pooja Sawant, Makrand Deshpande

Music by: Amit Raj

Cinematography:	Aniket Khandagale

Edited by: Kshitija Khandagale

Production companies: Sai Pooja Film & Entertainment Production

Release dates: 2 October 2015 (Theatrical)

Running time: 1H 59Min.

Country: India

Language: Marathi
